cd ${PKG_ROOT}
go run ${WORK}/main.go
cd ${WORK}
cmp stdout want.txt

-- main.go --
package main

import . "github.com/efd6/dispear"

func main() {
	DESCRIPTION("sort")

	SORT("", "src", "")
	SORT("", "src", "asc")
	SORT("dst", "src", "asc")

	Generate()
}
-- want.txt --
---
description: sort
processors:
  - sort:
      tag: sort_src_3c3e6b69
      field: src
  - sort:
      tag: sort_src_asc_0b04d1e0
      field: src
      order: asc
  - sort:
      tag: sort_src_into_dst_asc_8cdf9f55
      field: src
      target_field: dst
      order: asc
